name: Bomb Shooter
inGameDesc: Launches a powerful bomb at the Bloons. Slow rate of fire but affects a radius around the explosion.

path1.name: Bigger Bombs
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Shoots larger bombs, they have a larger blast area and more popping power.
Effect: Explosions have much greater blast area (12 to 18) and pop +6 bloons.

path1.name: Heavy Bombs
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Heavy duty bombs can smash through 2 layers of Bloon at once and pop more Bloons.
Effect: Explosions deal +1 damage and can pop an additional +10 bloons.

path1.name: Really Big Bombs
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Huge bombs deal greater damage in a large area and allow Frags to pop more Bloons.
Effect: Explosions have even greater blast area (18 to 27), deal 3 damage instead of 2, and pop +30 bloons. With Frag Bombs, improves fragment damage, pierce, count, and lifespan. Pushes back Bloons hit by 10 units.

path1.name: Bloon Impact
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Explosions become so violent Bloons are stunned for a short time when they are hit. Range is increased and frags are even more effective.
Effect: Explosions stun affected bloons for 1.4s. Gains +3 range. With Frag Bombs, improves frag pierce, count, and lifespan.

path1.name: Bloon Crush
path1.upgradeBody:
Description: Bloon shattering explosions do massive damage and can stun MOAB-Class bloons.
Effect: Explosions deal +9 more damage, pop Black Bloons, and stun both MOAB-class- and normal bloons for 2.0s. With Frag Bombs, fragments deal much more damage, particularly against Ceramics, and gain much more pierce. Pushes back MOAB-class Bloons hit by 5 units.

path2.name: Faster Reload
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Reloads faster.
Effect: Attacks +33% faster (0.75x attack cooldown).

path2.name: Missile Launcher
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Exchanges bombs for missiles, which fire faster, fly faster, and increase range.
Effect: Attacks +36% faster (0.7333x attack cooldown) on top of the previous upgrade, gains +4 range, and gains +50% projectile speed.

path2.name: MOAB Mauler
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: MOAB Maulers do much more damage to MOAB-Class Bloons.
Effect: Explosions deal 16 damage to MOAB-class. Also gains +5 range.

path2.name: MOAB Assassin
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Assassinate MOAB ability: Special missile flies out and does massive damage to MOAB-Class Bloons. Regular attack range and MOAB-class damage also increased.
Effect: Ability targets the strongest blimp on screen and deals an instant 750 damage plus a weaker explosion to the first blimp hit. Main attack deals 31 damage to MOAB-class and 5 damage to Ceramics, and gains +5 range.

path2.name: MOAB Eliminator
path2.upgradeBody:
Description: Massive damage to MOABs and Assassinate ability deals 6x damage with a short cooldown.
Effect: Ability targets the strongest blimp on screen and deals an instant 4500 damage to the first blimp hit with 3x faster ability cooldown. Main attack deals 100 damage to MOAB-class and gains normal damage type.

path3.name: Extra Range
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Increases attack range.
Effect: Gains +7 range.

path3.name: Frag Bombs
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Explosions throw sharp fragments that can pop more Bloons including Black Bloons.
Effect: Adds +2 range. Explosions produce sharp fragments that pop up to 1 bloon each. Both explosions and frags can now pop Black Bloons, frags cannot pop lead bloons. Improves frags with higher-level Path 1 upgrades.

path3.name: Cluster Bombs
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Throws out secondary bombs instead of sharp fragments every shot.
Effect: Produces 1 cluster of 8 smaller secondary bombs that pop up to 8 bloons per secondary bomb. Both explosions pop all bloons, including Black Bloons.

path3.name: Recursive Cluster
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Every second shot the cluster bombs send out more cluster bombs for even more destruction.
Effect: Every second shot, the bomb explosion explode three times per shot with much larger explosions and huge pierce. Can hit the same target up to 17 times despite visuals depicting 73 explosions. Explosions deal extra damage to Fortified bloons.

path3.name: Bomb Blitz
path3.upgradeBody:
Description: Deals much more damage and gains the passive Bomb Storm Ability - when lives are lost, the Bomb Storm automatically triggers, which destroys all but the biggest of Bloons.
Effect: Deals 5 damage and plus 5 damage to Fortified per explosion, creates recursive explosions every shot, and gains a passive ability that deals an instant 2000 damage on screen and wipes out BFBs and below after losing a life.
